Title: New Dream Hunter Rem: Yume no Kishitachi
Description: ['Rem is an ordinary woman in our world but, in the world of dreams, she becomes a dream warrior, defending humanity from the evils there. When dream demons reach the waking world, she fights them with the help of her pets which transform into a tiger and wolf.']
Related: ['Prequel: Dream Hunter Rem', 'Sequel: New Dream Hunter Rem: Setsuriku no Mudenmekyu']
Staff: [['Okuda, Seiji', 'Director, Storyboard, Original Creator'], ['Matsui, Naoko', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Kise, Kazuchika', 'Key Animation'], ['Yoshida, Tooru', 'Key Animation']]
